_header: Saint John was the best bairn the holy baptist
Subjects: saints’ lives; John the Baptist, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. John the Baptist in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Ion was þe beste bern þe holi baptistþat of
                    womman was ibore euere saue ihesu crist…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou seynt Ion þat in flum Iordan baptised godes soneLet
                    ous þoru our cristendom to þe Ioie of heuene come

Bod779.First Lines:
Good is to habbe in mende sein Ihon þe baptisteffor he was
                    þe beste berne after Ihesu criste…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Seint Ihon þat in flom iordan cristenyd goddes sonehelp
                    vs to oure cristindom to þe ioy of heuen to come

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Iohn was þe beste bern þe holy BaptystÞat of
                    wommon was i bore wiþ oute Ihesu crist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now seint Ion þat in flum Iordan Baptizede Godus soneLet
                    vs þorwh vr cristendom to þe Ioye of heuene come Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Iohan was þe beste bern þe holie baptistÞat
                    euere of womman was ibore with oute ihesu crist…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nouþe seint Iohan þat in þe flym Iordan baptisede
                    godes soneIieue us þoruȝ ore cristindom to þe Ioye of
                    heouene come
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 29-33.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Iohn was þe beste bern þat holy baptistþat of
                    womman was y bore Wiþ outen Ihesu crist…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Ion þat in flum Iordan baptised godes soneLete
                    vs þorw oure cristendon to þe Ioye of heuene come
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

Horstmann,  Carl,

             The Early South-English Legendary.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
…þat angel þat was messagere to marie þe maiden
                    freAnd broght bodworde þat goddeȝ sonne of hir sulde beffor
                    Gabriel was messengere of þe birthe of cristeAnd selfe angel bodworde
                    broght of þe birth of Jon baptyste…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Þis sterne houed still when it come ouer þat
                    stedeTil marcel þis abbot had founden þis haly hede
CULAdd3039.Note: Begins and ends imperfectly due to loss of folios.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Iohan was þe beste bern þe holy baptistþat of
                    womman was euere ibore wiþ oute ihesu crist…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou sein Ion þat in flum Iordan baptisede godes soneLete
                    us þoru oure cristendom to þe ioie of heuene come
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.241-46.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Ion was þe best born þe holy BaptistÞat euere
                    of womman was ybore wiþoute oure lord crist…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Seint Ion þat in fflom Iordan Baptizedest godes
                    soneLete vs þorw cristendom to þe ioye of heuene come

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint Ion was þe best berne þe holy baptiste þat of
                    womman was ybore withoute ihesu crist…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…seint Ion þat in flom Iordan baptysid godis sonelate ous
                    þorwe oure cristendom in to heuene come

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Ion was þe beste bern þe holi baptistþat of woman was euer ibore saue ihesu crist…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou sein Ion þat in flom Iordan baptisede godes sonelet ous þorou our cristendom in þe ioie of heuen come

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Ion was þe beste bern þe holi baptistþat of wommon was ibore wiþ oute ihesu crist…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Seint Ion þat in flum Iordan volwede godes soneLet vs þorw oure cristendom into heuene come

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn þe beste barne þe holy baptysteÞat euer
                    wos borne of womon with oute Ihesu Crist…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…Þai wenten god after & his apostels were& after
                    his dethe wide wenten cristendome to ler

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Iohn was þe beste bern þe holi baptistÞat of womman was ibore wiþoute ihesu crist…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou Seint Iohn þat in flom Iordan baptisede godes soneLete ous þurf oure cristendom to þe ioye of heuene come

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Iohn was þe best childe þe holy baptistÞat of
                    eny womman was bore outake Ihesu crist…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Nowe seint Iohn þat in flom Iordeyn baptisest goddis
                    soneSende vs grace þat we mote to þe blis of heuene
                    come
